mainText:
My first computer was an Apple and my last computer will be an Apple.  
Computers have been a huge part of my life since the first time I 
touched a computer, an Apple II.  I'm a programmer now and every 
milestone of my becoming a programmer has involved an Apple computer, 
from the first program that I wrote in Logo on an Apple II to the Apple 
computers I use now.  You are one of the most influential people on my 
life and I thank you for that influence.  You thought different and the 
world was a better place for it.  I'll miss you, Steve.
author: Turing
